allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix bugs and remove dead code

- Fix sort typo in classic.js \(a.sort -> a.score\)
- Remove duplicate functions in classic.js
- Fix speed.js board length bug \(capture count before clearing\)
- Fix botModal.js method call \(this.ui.cleanupBotComboVisuals\)
- Remove unused checkGameEndCount, canBotCapture, debugCardState

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
